Text: no seeders....so i can not tell you what version it is.....sorry....but if you like kim larsen and or gasolin you should be listening to the live album "gĂ¸glernes aften - live in scandinavia..."....great album.....
Ye i got that album too, but this version of "this is my life" is soooooooooo much better than the live one!

Hi TigerMale
It's the version from the LP "Kim Larsen og Yankeedrengene" recorded at Lowery Studio, Atlanta USA in 1977.
Sold in Denmark in 1978 (CBS 82090).
Also found on the LP "Supermix 1" (Gasolin) from 1980.
1000 tak ;) det er sku en af de gode gamle
seed tak sĂĽ vil jeg blive meget glad :D
